title: Match starts with 140 FPS & after 4 minutes FPS stays 30-12 for the rest of the game.
body: Please, No, Your FPS guide didn't help at all, League is the only game I have this issue with LOW SETTINGS on everything, If there's a fix then cool if not then I'll miss this game very much.

replies.body: That sucks if the steps in the guide hasn't helped.  :(  What happens if you try capping your framerate via in-game video options?  Usually that can fix it up.  If not, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs and let our tech team help you out directly through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

I did that and they said they are aware fps got fucked up in latest patch and they are trying to find solution, for everyone who wants to send logs just to save them time, that answer is what they will get.

I did that and they said they are aware fps got fucked up in latest patch and they are trying to find solution, for everyone who wants to send logs just to save them time, that answer is what they will get.

man check this out ur not the only one.https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/tUlIPfmb-anyone-else-experiencing-lower-fps-since-last-patch-722-pre-season
Riot is saying they are fixing it but 1 week later still nothing
